title: Etched In Skin
description: **This book is no longer available.**Tattoo artist and shop owner, Gunner, has never cared about what people think of him. He knows all too well that life can be very hard. He fights, he's rough, has a temper and isn't planning to change anytime soon. Something else he definitely isn't planning on? Finding someone to spend his life with. When Gunner meets Sid, a guy who's pretty much his polar opposite, the two form an unlikely friendship and Gunner begins to see that sometimes life has a way of changing even the best-laid plans.
author: Ann  Lee
